2007.msg: The maximum number of registered users in the development environment is 100. In the production environment, up to 100 registered users can be used for free. Exceeding 100 requires upgrading to the IM commercial version.

20003.msg: {{name}} length exceeds the limit, {{name}} >= {{min}} and {{name}} <= {{max}} unit: bytes

20001.msg: Parameter type is incorrect, please check the parameter type, it should be Object but {{currentType}} was passed

1004.msg: Signature error, please verify if Appkey and Secret are correct
